pbj 0.1.7
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    addSignal()

    Loads NIfTI Images and Adds Synthetic Signal

    cluster()

    Computes contiguous clusters from a statistical image given a threshold

    coef(<statMap>)

    Gets a 4D niftiImage of the statistical image from a statMap object

    colorBar()

    Draws a color bar in a figure

    crop()

    Crop niftiImages

    getDesign()

    Gets a Full and Reduced Design Matrices for a Linear Model

    getPvalues()

    Gets p-values for Simulation Study

    image(<niftiImage>)

    Create images of a NiFTI object

    image(<statMap>)

    View statMap and pbj results in a statMap object

    inferenceIndex()

    Gets numeric index of observed stat corresponding to the method and CFT

    lmPBJ()

    Computes Statistical Map for Neuroimaging Data

    maxima()

    Computes local maxima from an nifti image

    mmeStat()

    Compute maxima, CMI, or CEI inference statistics

    palm()

    this is an R wrapper function for PALM it has limited functionality for the features that PALM offers

    pbjBoot()

    Performs (semi)Parametric Bootstrap Joint ((s)PBJ) Inference

    pbjInference()

    Performs (semi)Parametric Bootstrap Joint ((s)PBJ) Inference

    pbjInferenceBG()

    Performs (semi)Parametric Bootstrap Joint ((s)PBJ) Inference

    pbjInferenceFG()

    Performs (semi)Parametric Bootstrap Joint ((s)PBJ) Inference

    plotData.statMap()

    Creates dataframes, emmeans, and models of the selected ROI data

    ptfce.statmap()

    Compute pTFCE image

    resave()

    Updates a .Rdata file

    stat.statMap()

    Returns a statistical niftiImage object from a statMap object

    summary(<statMap>)

    object A statMap object

    table.statMap()

    Create cluster/maxima summary table

    var.statMap()

    Gets a niftiImage of the variance image from a statMap object

    vpapx_edgeworth()

    A vectorized version of papx_edgeworth

    wecdf()

    Computes empirical weighted cdf. Modified from ecdf

    write.statMap()

    Write the statMap objects out

    Contents
